title: Lost in the Babylon
description: Steven Rosen's gripping memoir of overcoming addiction and organised crime, his journey of sobriety, becoming a millionaire and the desperate search to find a lost truth.Steven’s struggle for emotional survival as a child in London’s East End led him into a life of addiction and drug dealing with a warring Lebanese militia.A hardened criminal by the age of twenty-three, he had survived high-speed police chases, prisons and attempted suicide, but facing the truth was his toughest challenge.Abandoning crime, he rose from the depths of addiction to a successful businessman, but something essential was missing. The desperate search to find it cost him everything and plunged him back into the streets of his childhood and the precipice of life, death and the deep secret that awaited.
author: Steven Rosen
